Text:
Wow, thanks doh!  I saw four new releases pop up at thegreatcourses.com and the one I really really really want, being a history buff and all, is "30 Masterpieces of the Ancient World."

I'd love to see that one pop up here if at all possible.  Damn, I want an invite to that private tracker of yours.
There's a video version out there as well. Search for the title of this course and include this number: 1918835. I haven't checked the links though, but it was uploaded today. So be quick ;-)
@w55: A video version of "30 Masterpieces of the Ancient World" is on the same site as well I see. Also uploaded today.
Thx for the tip antignor. Downloading from downtr DOT co is a bit cumbersome, but they have a lot of interesting content.
like u say dohduhda   downtr DOT co is super cumbersome , plz upload it over here I still mourn demonoid but  less so thanks to u .thnx
@dohduhdah A "bit" cumbersome is quite an understatement. I haven't downloaded it myself yet either. It looks like it will be a several days project to get it in its entirety from there.
@dohduhdah. I've sent you a PM on KAT. You seem to not have logged into your account there for a while, but could you please check it out?
@antignor: Well, given the price/quality/value of these courses, I think it's worth a couple of clicks solving a few captchas and a slow download for every lecture.
Just an idea: If everybody shares here the pieces they already have, it will be faster to get the all courses with fewer clicks, and solving fewer captchas!
